'''Compiz''' is one of the first [[compositing window manager]]s for the [[X Window System]] that uses [[3D graphics]] hardware to create fast [[compositing]] desktop effects for window management. The effects, such as a minimization effect and a cube workspace are implemented as loadable plugins. Because it conforms to the [[Inter-Client Communication Conventions Manual]] standard, Compiz can substitute for the default [[Metacity]] in [[GNOME]] or [[KWin]] in [[KDE]].
'''Compiz''' is one of the first [[compositing window manager]]s for the [[X Window System]] that uses [[3D graphics]] hardware to create fast [[compositing]] desktop effects for window management. The effects, such as a minimization effect and a cube workspace are implemented as loadable plugins. Because it conforms to the [[Inter-Client Communication Conventions Manual]] standard, Compiz can substitute for the default [[Metacity]] in [[GNOME]] or [[KWin]] in [[KDE]].
